name: Be There
description:
This game is developed by me, Felix Mark and in a very early state.
There is only one real level (and one for my tryhard friends lol) to test the movement, conversation system, fighting mechanics, art style etc.
This is my very first project ever, so I am very open for constructive criticism, improvement ideas, bug reports and any kind of feedback!
I hope you enjoy this game so far, as I am planning to continue working on it.
<3

Controls
  • A / D - move left/right
  • Space - jump
  • E - Attack
  • F11 - Toggle fullscreen
  • F2 - Take screenshot
  • M - Switch between record and replay mode

Controllers/Gamepads are supported (controls explained ingame).

Discord

You can join the game's Discord if you want to receive updates or talk a bit!
